articles.author: HT Correspondent
articles.title: Rauf, Imam shine as Pakistan beat Bangladesh in Asia Cup Super Four clash - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Rauf proved to be too quick for the Bangladeshi batters, who were also troubled relentlessly by Naseem Shah after Shakib-Al-Hasan opted to bat. | Cricket
articles.content:
Pakistan fast bowlers Shaheen Afridi, Naseem Shah and Haris Rauf underlined their calibre in a seven-wicket win against Bangladesh in a Super 4 Asia Cup game in Lahore on Wednesday.
